price: Sọ pé: “Olúwa mi, Ó ṣeé ṣe kí Ó fi ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣèlérí rẹ̀ fún wọn hàn mí,
arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yūʿadūna
